titleStmt.title: The grounds and occasions of the controversy concerning the unity of God &c. the methods by which it has been managed, and the means to compose it / by a Divine of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Nye, Stephen, 1648?-1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by E. Whitlock,

notesStmt.note: For discussion of ascription to Stephen Nye see H. McLachlan, The story of a nonconformist library, p. 77.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
